ch.epfl.lis.gnwgui
Class NetworkManager

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lis.gnwgui.idesktop.IDesktop
      ch.epfl.lis.gnwgui.NetworkManager

public class NetworkManager
extends IDesktop

Extends a iDesktop to display open, bin and network icons.

Author:
Thomas Schaffter (firstname.name@gmail.com)

init

public void init()
Initialization The desktop is created with a bin and the item "Open" used to allow the user to import networks.

itemReleased

public void itemReleased(IElement item)
Action to execute when an item is released. For instance, if the item is released on the bin and is destroyable, the item is remove from the desktop.
